data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Relizane. Through your servants plant 145 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Relizane, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 495 believers in the state of Relizane the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1467 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 726,200 souls in Relizane and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Relizane, Algeria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Belbali people.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Relizane, Algeria.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Relizane, Algeria.

data.section_summary:
the state of Relizane, Algeria has a population of 726,200.

We estimate Relizane has 495 people who might know Jesus, 60 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 725,645 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,467 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Relizane, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
